verses.text: In Him: O life of glo - ry! in Him: O life of love! In Him: this is my sto - ry, in Him: a - bove
In Him: born back to glo - ry, in Him: o - ver-come sin; In Him: ask'd ere for glo - ry, in Him: shall not be vain
In Him: no love of stream - er, in Him: raised from care; In Him: Christ rules su - preme, Walk not - ing down
In Him: with just hope for - ev - er, in Him: truth he comes; In Him: O - ver eth - er, in Him: at home.
